books.title: The Eye of the World
books.author: Robert Jordan
books.description: Several youngsters from backwater village must flee with a mysterious couple when evil creatures attack. Book One of the Wheel of Time series.

books.title: The Great Hunt
books.author: Robert Jordan
books.description: The group divides - half on a quest to recover the fabled Horn of Valere - the others to reach the White Tower of Tar Valon. Book Two of the Wheel of Time Series.

books.title: The Dragon Reborn
books.author: Robert Jordan
books.description: Rand al'Thor continues his quest to fulfill the prophesies of the Dragon. Book 3 of the Wheel of Time.
